none: The Other was recorded in Buncombe County NC. County, North Carolina on July 14, 1823. John Webb sold the enslaved person(s) Teany - Black ("negro") - female - 17,Anoiry - Black ("negro") - female - 1/2 to Martin Gash,Mary Gash.
